name: Lyrics search
description: Find the complete lyrics for any song by searching with the title and artist name.

name: bible search
description: Search through the Bible by book, chapter, verse, or keywords to find specific passages.

name: quran search
description: Search the Quran by Surah, Ayah, or keywords to read and study verses in detail.

name: Tiktok search
description: Discover TikTok videos, users, and trends by searching with keywords or hashtags.

name: twitter search
description: Search for tweets, users, or trending topics on Twitter/X in real-time.

name: youtube search
description: Search for YouTube videos, channels, and playlists directly from our platform.

name: movie search
description: Get detailed information about movies and TV shows, including ratings, cast, and plot summaries.

name: image search
description: Search for high-quality images across the web using keywords or by uploading an image.

name: wallpaper search
description: Find and download beautiful HD wallpapers for your desktop, phone, or tablet.

name: wallpaper 2
description: An alternative source for wallpapers, offering a different collection of high-quality backgrounds.

name: tiktok trend search
description: Discover currently trending hashtags, sounds, and challenges on TikTok.

name: tiktok user search
description: Search for specific TikTok user profiles to view their content and statistics.

name: SoundCloud search
description: Search for tracks, artists, and playlists on the SoundCloud platform.

name: spotify search
description: Search Spotify's extensive library for songs, albums, artists, and playlists.

name: random bible inspiration
description: Get a random, inspirational verse from the Bible for daily reflection and motivation.

name: dictionary
description: Look up definitions, synonyms, antonyms, and word origins for any English word.
